history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER pause
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER 5 has
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. </speak>
TTS What is your destination?For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER So Joe's Hospital.
TTS Okay, going to upmc children's hospital of pittsburgh.
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university.
TTS Okay, travelling at 05:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 21 minutes, and you will take 1 bus..
Walk for about 7 mins to Craig St at Park Plaza..
Take the 93 ,to Main St at Penn avenue It will depart at 5:17pm..
Walk for about 4 mins to 4401 Penn avenue..
TTS <speak>if you missed anything, please say repeat, else say continue</speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
